TopicTitle: Mun Survey Spamming From Polar Orbit

Articles.Content:
It turns out that Mun survey contracts are spammable. I put a spacecraft into polar orbit, as it seemed like the most sensible way to overfly all of the waypoints.

After completing the contract, I checked Mission Control to decide what contract to do next and noticed that there was already another Mun survey contract available. I completed it from the same polar orbit without expending any fuel.

I checked back with Mission control and guess what they want me to do next...
So I'm not the only person doing this?!
I can't help but wonder whether the devs intended these contracts to be so easy.
